subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Froome, of Team Sky, who entered Stage 10 with a 12-second lead, extended his overall lead to 2 minutes 52 seconds on Tuesday with a stunning ride.
snippet: Froome, of Team Sky, who entered Stage 10 with a 12-second lead, extended his overall lead to 2 minutes 52 seconds on Tuesday with a stunning ride.
